events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but the tracking info hasn't updated and my package still hasn't arrived.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late shipment and unupdated tracking.
Customer support agent has been assigned to this case to handle the inquiry regarding delayed delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your delayed order and will do my best to resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and any additional details you have about the shipment to help us track it down?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the tracking number provided still shows 'label created' with no updates.
Thank you for the info. We’ve contacted the shipping provider and found an unexpected delay. We expect it to arrive within 3 more days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you looking into this and hope it arrives soon.
Your package has now been marked as delivered. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Just checking in to confirm that your delivery was received and that you’re satisfied with the resolution of the issue.
As we have not heard back, the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience, and please contact us anytime.
